main event: A 16-year-old girl observed a red, oval-shaped object that hovered and then moved in Mishawaka, Indiana on May 9, 1952.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The object was described as dull red in color and oval in shape., It hovered for a short period before moving into a cloud bank., The observer indicated that this object was not an airplane light., At the time of the sighting, balloons were launched at 0300 but were extremely high, potentially causing confusion in color.
witness description: a 16-year-old girl, described as intelligent and well-informed but not well-versed in aerodynamics
